children.name: mandatory
children.description: If this value is true, they must be marked as open

children.name: minimum_special_reg_hour
children.description: Minimum number of hours required for the seller to operate on that day

children.name: minimum_start_time
children.description: The start hour for that day should not be set earlier than this time

children.name: minimum_end_time
children.description: The end hour for that day should not be set earlier than this time

children.name: operating_24_hr
children.description: If the toggle value is true, the user can set the start_time to 00:00 and the end_time to 23:59 to indicate that the shop is operating 24 hours a day

response_fields.name: error_permission
response_fields.description: Sorry you don't have the permission detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Regular Operating Hours

response_fields.name: error_notfound
response_fields.description: The information you queried is not found
